metadata.title: CVE-2021-23520 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: The package juce-framework/juce before 6.1.5 are vulnerable to ArbitraryFile Write via Archive Extraction (Zip Slip) via theZipFile::uncompressEntry function in juce_ZipFile.cpp. This vulnerabilityis triggered when the archive is extracted upon calling uncompressTo() on aZipFile object.

criterions.comment: juce package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
